resources.string: Considers the as-is state and the vital health info of the patient and suggests an optimal path for better health
Provides the patient with intelligent prompts and sends behavioral nudges to motivate and continue to hit the key milestones in their better well-being journey.
Collects data over a period and displays the patient’s journey outcomes by analyzing information from well-being/health apps, change of lifestyle

Disclaimer: By using this app, users acknowledge that they understand and accept the limitations of the information provided, and they agree that the app\'s creators and developers are not responsible for any adverse outcomes arising from its use. Always consult with a healthcare professional for accurate and personalized medical advice.
